tool_description:
Tamil Dictionary API.  Access agarathi.com tamil dictionary functionality in an easy to use REST API form.  The following dictionaries are available.

"University of Madras Lexicon",
"J.P.Fabricius Tamil and English Dictionary",
"Miron Winslow - A Comprehensive Tamil and English Dictionary",
"David McAlpin - A Core vocabulary for Tamil",
"தமிழ் தமிழ் அகரமுதலி",
"agarathi.com dictionary"
title: Tamil Dictionary

api_list.name: Word of the day
api_list.description: Get Tamil word of the day

required_parameters.name: X-Agarathi-Api-Secret
required_parameters.description: Agrathi API key ( Get yours here http://agarathi.com/api/dictionary )
